trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows status bar control.
trans-unit.target: 代表一個 Windows 狀態列控制項。

trans-unit.source: StatusStrip replaces the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: StatusStrip 取代<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Special features of StatusStrip include a custom table layout, support for the form's sizing and moving grips, and support for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A> property, which allows a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to fill available space automatically.
trans-unit.target: StatusStrip 的特殊功能，可包括自訂資料表配置、 支援表單的大小和移動盡辦法，以及在支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>屬性，可讓<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>自動填滿可用空間。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: 下列項目專為緊密地與這兩個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>中所有方向。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the StatusStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> A StatusStrip control displays information about an object being viewed on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, the object's components, or contextual information that relates to that object's operation within your application.
trans-unit.target: 它們可在設計階段 StatusStrip 控制項預設可以:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>StatusStrip 控制項顯示上正在檢視之物件的相關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，物件的元件或在您的應用程式中的該物件的作業與相關內容資訊。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a StatusStrip control consists of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> objects, each of which displays text, an icon, or both.
trans-unit.target: StatusStrip 控制項通常包含的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>物件，其中每個顯示的文字、 圖示或兩者。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>

trans-unit.source: The StatusStrip can also contain <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> controls.
trans-unit.target: 也可以包含 StatusStrip <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSplitButton> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownButton>

trans-unit.source: The default StatusStrip has no panels.
trans-unit.target: 預設 StatusStrip 有沒有面板。

trans-unit.source: To add panels to a StatusStrip, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, or use the [StatusStrip Items Collection Editor](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1) at design time to add, remove, or reorder items and modify properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要將面板加入至 StatusStrip 中，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法或使用[StatusStrip 項目集合編輯器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7c56677b-d5eb-4eca-949c-a22c4e3833a1)在設計階段加入、 移除或重新排列項目和修改屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the [StatusStrip Tasks Dialog Box](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c) at design time to run common commands.
trans-unit.target: 使用[StatusStrip 工作對話方塊](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c150678b-4873-4743-b23f-84fb3126582c)在設計階段執行的常見命令。

trans-unit.source: Although StatusStrip replaces and extends the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: 雖然 StatusStrip 會取代及擴充<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>的較舊的版本控制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>如果您選擇保留以提供回溯相容性及未來使用。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> supports overflow functionality.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>支援溢位功能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> supports overflow functionality; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>支援溢位功能，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新控制項的協助工具物件。

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: 如果您沒有明確呼叫 CreateAccessibilityInstance 方法，它會呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>參考屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 以取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Creates a default <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> with the specified text, image, and event handler on a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>與指定的文字、 影像和事件處理常式，新<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the CreateDefaultItem method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> with commonly used characteristics to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>常用的特性與</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>使用 CreateDefaultItem 方法

trans-unit.source: The text to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的文字<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the `text` parameter is a hyphen (-), this method creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`text`參數為連字號 （-），這個方法會建立<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>上顯示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 引發的事件處理常式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref>事件時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>按下。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Image%2CSystem.EventHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>, or a if the text parameter is a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Image%2CSystem.EventHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>，或如果 text 參數是連字號 （-）。

trans-unit.source: Gets which borders of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> are docked to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的哪些邊緣<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>停駐在<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the left, right, top, and bottom edges of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> from the edges of the form.
trans-unit.target: 取得以像素左、 右、 上框線和下的邊緣之間的間距， <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>從表單的邊緣。

trans-unit.source: Use the DefaultPadding property to set the interior space between controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定控制項之間的內部空間使用 DefaultPadding 屬性。

trans-unit.source: When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: 項目的容器，控制項時，填補會從容器的邊緣表示空間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示間距。

trans-unit.source: The default is `{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}`.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是`{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否顯示工具提示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>預設。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> when it is first created.
trans-unit.target: 取得大小，單位為像素的<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>第一次建立時。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> constructor representing the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A>建構函式表示的大小<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>，像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>參考。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用`Dispose()`每個參考物件的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> borders are docked to its parent control and determines how a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> is resized with its parent.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定其<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>停駐在其父控制項框線，並決定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>隨其父代重新調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Use the Dock property to define how a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is automatically resized as its parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 使用停駐屬性來定義如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>其父控制項調整大小時，會自動調整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting Dock to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle> causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> to align itself with the left edges of its parent control and to resize as the parent control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要設定停駐<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>導致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>其父控制項的左邊緣對齊本身，並會隨著調整父控制項調整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle>

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked in their Z-order, which is the visual layering of controls on a form along the form's Z-axis (depth).
trans-unit.target: 控制項停駐在其疊置順序，也就是表單的 z 軸 （深度） 沿著表單上控制項的視覺化圖層。

trans-unit.source: A control can be docked to one edge of its parent container or can be docked to all edges and fill the parent container.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以停駐於父容器的某一邊或可停駐的邊緣和填滿的父容器。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visibility of the grip used to reposition the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來重新調整控制項位置的底框之可視性。

trans-unit.source: Even with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A> property set to `true` and the GripStyle property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: 即使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>屬性設定為`true`和 GripStyle 屬性設定為`Visible`，除非也設定，將不會顯示調整大小底框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>溢位值的其中一個屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.SizingGrip%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>，將不會顯示調整大小底框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> lays out the items collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如何<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>配置項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the LayoutStyle property to get or set how items are arranged on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定項目如何排列於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>使用 LayoutStyle 屬性

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: 繪製控制項的背景。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPaintBackground 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> to paint.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref>資訊包含關於<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>來繪製。

trans-unit.source: Provides custom table layout for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供自訂的資料表配置<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Override OnSpringTableLayoutCore to do custom table layouts.
trans-unit.target: 執行自訂的資料表配置又 OnSpringTableLayoutCore 會覆寫。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Resets the collection of displayed and overflow items after a layout is done.
trans-unit.target: 重設顯示的集合，並在配置完成之後，溢位項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否顯示工具提示<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the ShowItemToolTips property to get or set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> display behavior.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用 ShowItemToolTips 屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>顯示行為。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果工具提示會顯示為<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the boundaries of the sizing handle (grip) for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得調整大小控點 （底框） 的界限<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> representing the grip boundaries.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>代表的底框界限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a sizing handle (grip) is displayed in the lower-right corner of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在控制項的右下角顯示縮放控點 （底框）。

trans-unit.source: You can use the SizingGrip property to display a grip to provide an indication to the user of when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> is resizable.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 SizingGrip 屬性以顯示可提供指示給使用者時的底框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>可以調整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>

trans-unit.source: Even with the SizingGrip property set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A> property set to `Visible`, the sizing grip will not be displayed unless you also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property to one of the overflow values.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 SizingGrip 屬性設定為`true`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A>屬性設定為`Visible`，除非也設定，將不會顯示調整大小底框<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>溢位值的其中一個屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip.GripStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>, the sizing grip will not be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle>，將不會顯示調整大小底框。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLayoutStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.LayoutStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a grip is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果顯示的底框。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> stretches from end to end in its container.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>延伸在其容器中的端對端。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> stretches from end to end in its <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>兩端之間自動縮放的端對端其<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure wraps messages that Windows sends.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構包裝 Windows 會傳送的訊息。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: You can use this structure to wrap a message and assign it to the window procedure to be dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此結構包裝訊息，並將它指派給要分派的視窗程序。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this structure to get information about a message the system sends to your application or controls.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用此結構，以取得有關訊息的資訊系統傳送到您的應用程式或控制項。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure directly.
trans-unit.target: 無法建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構時，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message.Create%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: To make creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures more efficient, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure uses its pool of existing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structures instead of creating an instance of a new one, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構更有效率，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構會使用其現有的集區<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構，而不是盡可能建立一個新的執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: However, if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message> structure is not available in the pool, a new instance of the structure is created.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>結構為不在集區中，會建立結構的新執行個體。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Message>

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>至處理序。
